00030 vector<Schedule> GeneticAlgorithm::parentsSelection(int kindOfSelection){
00031         vector<Schedule> parents;
00032         switch (kindOfSelection){
00033         case 0:
00034                 {
00035                         parents =  randomParentsSelection();
00036                 } break;
00037                 
00038         default:
00039                 break;
00040                 
00041         }
00042         return parents;
00043 }

00046 //Should it be alowed to select the same parent?
00047 vector<Schedule> GeneticAlgorithm::randomParentsSelection(){
00048         vector<Schedule> parents;
00049         vector<Schedule>::iterator iterator;
00050         for(int i=0;i<2;i++){
00051                 randomIndex = (random()%population.size())+0;
00052                 parents.push_back(population[randomIndex]);
00053                 iterator = population.begin() + randomIndex;
00054                 population.erase(iterator);
00055         }
00056 //      cout << "randomSelection population.size() = "<< population.size() << endl;
00057 //      cout << "randomSelection parents[0].size() = "<< parents[0].size() << endl;
00058 //      cout << "randomSelection parents[1].size() = "<< parents[1].size() << endl;
00059         return parents;
00060 }

00062 vector<Schedule> GeneticAlgorithm::crossover(vector<Schedule> parents, int kindOfXover){
00063         vector<Schedule> offsprings;
00064 //      cout << "crossover parents[0].size() = "<< parents[0].size() << endl;
00065         switch (kindOfXover){
00066         case 0:
00067                 {
00068                         offsprings = onePointscrossover(parents);
00069                 }
00070         default:
00071                 break;
00072         }
00073 //      cout << "crossover offsprings.size() = "<< offsprings.size() << endl;
00074         return offsprings;
00075 }

00077 vector<Schedule> GeneticAlgorithm::onePointscrossover(vector<Schedule> parents){
00078         vector<Schedule> offsprings;
00079         Schedule parent1 = parents[0];
00080         Schedule parent2 = parents[1];
00081         Schedule offspring1,offspring2;
00082         
00083         randomIndex =  (random()%(parents[0].size()-1))+1;
00084         
00085 //      cout << "onePointscrossover randomIndex = "<< randomIndex << endl;
00086         
00087 //      cout << "onePointscrossover parent1.size() = "<< parent1.size() << endl;
00088 //      cout << "onePointscrossover parent2.size() = "<< parent2.size() << endl;
00089         for(int i=0;i<randomIndex;i++){
00090                 offspring1.push_back(parent1.at(i));
00091                 offspring2.push_back(parent2.at(i));
00092         }
00093         for(int i=randomIndex;i<parent1.size();i++){
00094                 offspring1.push_back(parent2.at(i));
00095                 offspring2.push_back(parent1.at(i));
00096         }
00097         
00098 //      cout << "parent1:" << endl;
00099 //      for(int i=0;i<parent1.size();i++){
00100 //              cout << "       "<<  parent1.at(i)<< endl;
00101 //              
00102 //      }
00103 //      cout << "parent2:" << endl;
00104 //      for(int i=0;i<parent1.size();i++){
00105 //              cout << "       "<<  parent2.at(i)<< endl;
00106 //              
00107 //      }
00108 //      cout << "offspring1:" << endl;
00109 //      for(int i=0;i<offspring1.size();i++){
00110 //              cout << "       "<<  offspring1.at(i)<< endl;
00111 //              
00112 //      }
00113 //      cout << "offspring2:" << endl;
00114 //      for(int i=0;i<offspring2.size();i++){
00115 //              cout << "       "<<  offspring2.at(i)<< endl;
00116 //              
00117 //      }
00118         
00119         offsprings.push_back(offspring1);
00120         offsprings.push_back(offspring2);
00121         return offsprings;
00122 }

00124 Schedule  GeneticAlgorithm::mutation(Schedule aSchedule, double rateOfMutation){
00125         
00126 //      cout << " fitness before=" << this->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,0) << endl;
00127 
00128         int size = aSchedule.size();
00129         randomIndex = round(size * rateOfMutation);     
00130         
00131         vector<int> randomNumbers;
00132         for(int i=0;i<randomIndex;i++){
00133                 randomNumbers.push_back(i);
00134         }
00135         
00136         random_shuffle(randomNumbers.begin( ), randomNumbers.end( ));
00137 
00138         for(int i=0;i<randomNumbers.size();i++){
00139                 aSchedule[randomNumbers.at(i)] =  random()%numOfResources+0;
00140         }
00141         
00142 //      cout << " fitness after=" << this->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,0) << endl;
00143         return aSchedule;
00144 }

00147 Schedule  GeneticAlgorithm::mutationWithHeuristic(Schedule aSchedule, double rateOfMutation){
00148         int size = aSchedule.size();
00149         randomIndex = round(size * rateOfMutation);     
00150         
00151 //      cout << "fitness before " << this->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,2) << endl;
00152         vector<int> randomNumbers;
00153         for(int i=0;i<randomIndex;i++){
00154                 randomNumbers.push_back(i);
00155         }
00156         
00157         random_shuffle(randomNumbers.begin(), randomNumbers.end());
00158 
00159         for(int i=0;i<randomNumbers.size();i++){
00160                 randomIndex = random()%numOfResources+0;
00161                 while(this->resourcesLoad.at(randomIndex)!=0){
00162                         randomIndex = random()%numOfResources+0;
00163                 }
00164 
00165                 aSchedule[randomNumbers.at(i)] = randomIndex;
00166         }
00167 //      cout << "fitness after " << this->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,2) << endl;
00168         
00169         return aSchedule;
00170 }

00172 double GeneticAlgorithm::fitnessFunction(Schedule aSchedule,int kinOfFitness){
00173         double executionTime;
00174         switch (kinOfFitness){
00175         case 0:
00176                 {
00177                         executionTime = executionTimeFunction(aSchedule);
00178                 }
00179                 break;
00180         case 1:
00181                 {
00182                         executionTime = flowTimeFunction(aSchedule);
00183                 }
00184                 break;
00185         case 2:
00186                 {
00187                         executionTime = getWaitTimeFunction(aSchedule);
00188                 }
00189                 break;
00190         default:
00191                 break;
00192         }
00193         return executionTime;
00194 }

00198 double GeneticAlgorithm::executionTimeFunction(Schedule aSchedule){
00199 //      executionTimes.clear();
00200         executionTime=0;
00201         mi=0;
00202         mips=0;
00203 
00204         for(int i=0;i<aSchedule.size();i++){
00205                 mi = taskMiRatings.at(i);
00206                 mips = resourceMipsRatings[aSchedule.at(i)];
00207                 
00208                 double temp = mi / mips;
00209                 
00210                 if(temp > executionTime) {
00211                         executionTime = temp;
00212                 }
00213         }
00214         
00215         return executionTime;
00216 }

00218 double GeneticAlgorithm::flowTimeFunction(Schedule aSchedule){
00219 //      flowTimes.clear();
00220         mi=0;
00221         mips=0;
00222         resLoad=0;
00223         double flowTime=0;
00224         for(int i=0;i<aSchedule.size();i++){
00225                 mi = taskMiRatings.at(i);
00226                 mips = resourceMipsRatings.at(aSchedule.at(i));
00227                 resLoad = resourcesLoad.at(i);
00228 //              cout <<" flowTimeFunction" << resLoad << endl;
00229                 double executionTime = mi / mips;
00230                 double waitTime = resLoad / mips;
00231                 
00232                 //executionTime = executionTime * 0.2;
00233                 
00234                 if( (executionTime + waitTime) > flowTime ){
00235                         flowTime = executionTime + waitTime;                    
00236 //                      if(aSchedule.at(i) == 7 && resLoad > 0){
00237 //                              cout << executionTime << "+" << waitTime << "=" << flowTime << endl;
00238 //                      }
00239                 }
00240         }
00241         return flowTime;
00242 }

00245 double GeneticAlgorithm::getWaitTimeFunction(Schedule aSchedule){
00246 //      flowTimes.clear();
00247         
00248         mips=0;
00249         resLoad=0;
00250         waitTime = 0;
00251         
00252         for(int i=0;i<aSchedule.size();i++){
00253 
00254                 mips = resourceMipsRatings[aSchedule.at(i)];
00255                 resLoad = resourcesLoad.at(i);
00256                 
00257                 double temp =  resLoad/mips;
00258                 
00259 //              cout <<" getWaitTimeFunction" << resLoad << endl;
00260                 if(temp > waitTime) {
00261                         waitTime = temp;
00262                 }
00263 
00264         }
00265 //      cout <<"getWaitTimeFunction: waitTime = " << waitTime << endl;
00266         return waitTime;
00267 }

00270 void GeneticAlgorithm::naturalSelection(vector<Schedule> candidates,int kindOfFitness){
00271         double fitness;
00272         double max;
00273         int index;      
00274         vector<Schedule>::iterator iterator;
00275                 
00276 //      cout << "  ----------------------- " << endl;
00277         for(int i=0;i<2;i++){
00278                 fitness=MAX_INT;
00279                 max=MIN_INT;
00280 //              cout << "  ----------------------- " << endl;
00281                 for(int j=0;j<candidates.size();j++){
00282                         fitness = fitnessFunction(candidates.at(j),kindOfFitness);
00283 //                      cout << " fitness " << fitness << " " << j << endl;
00284                         if(fitness > max ){
00285                                 max = fitness;
00286                                 index = j;
00287                         }
00288                 }
00289                 iterator = candidates.begin() + index;
00290                 candidates.erase(iterator);
00291 //              cout << index << " max="<< max << " candidates.size "<< candidates.size() << endl;
00292         }
00293         
00294 //      cout << index << " max="<< max << " candidates.size "<< candidates.size() << endl;
00295         for(int i=0;i<candidates.size();i++){
00296                 population.push_back(candidates.at(i));
00297         }
00298 }

00304 double GeneticAlgorithm::getAveragefitness(int kindOfFitness){
00305         double averagefitness=0;
00306         vector<double> avfitness;
00307         for(int i=0;i<population.size();i++){
00308                 averagefitness = averagefitness + (fitnessFunction(population.at(i),kindOfFitness));
00309                 avfitness.push_back(fitnessFunction(population.at(i),kindOfFitness));
00310         }
00311         return averagefitness/population.size();
00312 }

00350 vector<Schedule> GeneticAlgorithm::getBestSchedules(int n, int kinOfFitness){
00351         Schedule aSchedule;
00352         orderedPopulation.clear();
00353         vector<pair<double, int> > indexedFitness(population.size());   
00354         indexedFitness.clear();
00355         int index=0;
00356         
00357         for(int i=0;i<this->population.size();i++){
00358                 aSchedule = population.at(i);
00359                 indexedFitness.push_back(pair<double, int>(this->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,kinOfFitness), i));
00360         }
00361         
00362 //      cout << " before "<< endl;
00363 //      for (vector<pair<double, int> > ::iterator i = mirror.begin() ; i != mirror.end() ; ++i){
00364 //              cout << i->first << ", " << i->second << endl;
00365 //      }
00366         
00367         sort(indexedFitness.begin(), indexedFitness.end());
00368         
00369 //      cout << " GeneticAlgorithm: getBestSchedules will return "<< n << " schedules "<< endl;
00370         
00371         for (vector<pair<double, int> > ::iterator i = indexedFitness.begin() ; i != indexedFitness.end() ; ++i){
00372                 index++;
00373                 orderedPopulation.push_back( population.at(i->second) );
00374 //              cout << i->first << ", " << i->second << endl;
00375                 if(index >= n) {
00376                         break;
00377                 }
00378         }       
00379         
00380         return orderedPopulation;
00381 }

00383 vector<int> GeneticAlgorithm::getIndexOfBestSchedules(int n,int kinOfFitness){
00384         Schedule aSchedule;
00385         vector<pair<double, int> > indexedFitness(population.size());   
00386         indexedFitness.clear();
00387         int index=0;
00388         vector<int> indexes;
00389         
00390         for(int i=0;i<this->population.size();i++){
00391                 aSchedule = population.at(i);
00392                 indexedFitness.push_back(pair<double, int>(this->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,kinOfFitness), i));
00393         }
00394         
00395         sort(indexedFitness.begin(), indexedFitness.end());
00396                 
00397         for (vector<pair<double, int> > ::iterator i = indexedFitness.begin() ; i != indexedFitness.end() ; ++i){
00398                 index++;
00399                 indexes.push_back( i->second ); 
00400 //              cout << i->first << ", " << i->second << endl;
00401                 if(index >= n) {
00402                         break;
00403                 }
00404         }       
00405         
00406         return indexes;
00407 }
